Alternatively, if you're in the mood for a more recent and unconventional monster movie, "In the Woods" (2007) could be right up your alley. This quirky film follows a group of monsters living in an urban forest as they document their lives through a series of vlogs. It's a unique and offbeat take on the traditional monster movie, with a strong focus on character development and storytelling. 🌳

I hope you find something that interests you in this list! Let me know if you have any other questions or preferences.
